entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
